remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供的方法，可以将字符串转换为。The class provides methods that can convert a string to a . > [!NOTE] > 永远不应直接访问的类型转换器。You should never access a type converter directly. 相反，通过调用适当的转换器。Instead, call the appropriate converter by using . 有关详细信息，请参阅中的示例基类。For more information, see the examples in the base class. 有关类型转换器的详细信息，请参阅基类和[如何： 实现类型转换器](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90373a3f-d8c8-492d-841c-945d62393c56)。For more information about type converters, see the base class and [How to: Implement a Type Converter](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90373a3f-d8c8-492d-841c-945d62393c56). 有关打印的详细信息，请参阅命名空间概述。For more information on printing, see the namespace overview.

span.span: For example, "100,100,100,100" specifies 1 inch for the left, right, top, and bottom margins.
The conversion cannot be performed.
